reviews.review_text: Just purchased like about a month to two months ago and I can't seem to turn the phone on after charging. Even left it charging for 3 days it still won't turn on.

reviews.title: Not reg. service phone
reviews.review_text: I realize this is a prepaid phone. But I bought it to use for the phone only on my regular acct. Now neither of my phones will work. At first it did now it says there was a problem with activation. The acct is not in my name so I can t call to fix it, the acct holder will have to. It has made a terrible mess for me. I do like the size of the buttons and screen.

The phone will not turn on. When I plug it in, something on the inside screen flashes on and off saying “enabled by KaiOS” while vibrating but nothing else happens. The button labeled the power button does not turn it on and even after leaving in charger for 4 hours, still the same thing. There are no clear instructions for how to turn the device on either.

NEVER order online to be shipped to you. They will not show lt as being paid for and claim it can be set up at another Walmart ,which is not as the girls act like they don't have any idea what you're speaking about. I prefer the standard flip phone over all others, but trying to get one is like pulling hens teeth

reviews.title: Stopped Charging
reviews.review_text: Wet cheaply made. Purchased for grandfather for ease of use it advertised and described to be. However it was not, the battery life was ok first couple of weeks now phone won't charge and doesn't work.

The price was really good compared to other places. However, I originally went into the store and the employees in that department were not helpful. One handed the keys off to someone else and the next one fiddled with the case for a few minutes and then gave up and said he couldn't open it. He didn't try to get a manager or anything.

reviews.title: Couldn't get battery in phone. Very unhappy.
reviews.review_text: Needed an immediate phone while got a better replacement phone. Good price. However, The battery was separate from the phone and it wasn't obvious to me how to insert the battery. (No paperwork about the battery: i figured I would break the phone trying to figure out how to insert it. ) Someone wanted to save a couple of pennies by omitting the instructions.

reviews.title: Can't activate
reviews.review_text: I have spent hours at AT%26T trying to activate this phone. They finally realized that when you purchased the item through online Walmart stores, they often find that they are coded as a blacklisted item. Not necessarily stolen but classified as that. I am now having to return it to my local Walmart. They said the items sold at the store do not seem to have the same problem, but for some reason online Walmart they have seen this on several occasions became a very frustrating hassle.

reviews.title: WASTE OF MONEY- can't activate phone
reviews.review_text: Purchased from Walmart.com %26 can't activate the phone to use it. I have added $30 plan to it and can't use the phone, can't return it nor get the minutes back. MAJOR LOSS. The representative claims the phone was not scanned properly as purchased, cant even activate in store nor return this is SAD! Waste of money

Im hoping it was just this phone that thevolume was broke. it has a loud ringer but not many choices. I returned this one because even with the talking volume was at 15 the only way to hear it was to turn on the speaker. Walmart gave me a refund no problem.

reviews.title: doesn't activate
reviews.review_text: att said to return to the retailer i bought it from because they couldnt complete activation. once they fix it i will chahge my rating.

After setting up phone and putting minutes on it. Two days later we could not call out or take any calls. Called 611 and it said, “we need to go to retail and let them register the phone. Still not working. Set up return and will be taking it back.

reviews.title: not working
reviews.review_text: If you order of cell phone to have it delivered, make sure that it is activated when it is checked out before they bring it. Is turned into a real nightmare

I wanted a cheap flip phone for my elderly mother - this will work perfectly. The AT%26T store no longer carries them and they suggested I find them at Walmart or Target. I hate Target so I came to Walmart.

reviews.title: Flip Phone Relief
reviews.review_text: When I originally signed up with AT%26T I was told they did not carry flip phones anymore. We tried what I thought was a simple smart phone for my 83 yo father. It was not. Thankfully I found out you could buy a flip phone and change out the SIM card while keeping it in your current number and plan. I'm not sure why the AT%26T rep left out that tidbit other than I'm still paying for the smart phone and it's useless. They should do a better job for elderly because this flip phone works great. The buttons are bigger and you only have to open it to answer.

reviews.title: ok flip phone
reviews.review_text: not a bad flip phone but not as decent as the first generation phones like this one, this one does not have a fingerprint reader, pretty much it works the same as the first generation but the one thing I didn't like is it didn't have the some of the same apps as the first generation, I literally can search for an app on the first generation phone but not find it on the second generation Phone App Store. for a flip phone the price is right though, I'm returning it since since one of the main apps I need it does not let me download

reviews.title: Major hassle so far.
reviews.review_text: I'm sure it is probably a good phone, but it has been a nightmare to activate it. AT%26T told us that Walmart needs to activate it. When my sister took it to Walmart, they said “Take it to AT%26T.” It would be nice, since we bought it from Walmart, if Walmart could actually either activate it, or advise us what to do.

reviews.title: audibility
reviews.review_text: volume on the speaker is really hard to hear so I had to plug an ear bud in to hear it better

It worked fine for a while, but very hard to turn on. Tuesday morning,1/16 at 7;30 checked the weather due to freezing temps Later that morning i plugged in the charger and the phone went complete dead?? Will not turn on, or charge. Lucky that the electricity stayed on, or I would have been stranded. Am returning it..

reviews.title: Great for older generation, replace often.
reviews.review_text: Keeps breaking after a couple months. My 90 year old grandmother uses it because it's the only phone simple enough to understand for her. Keeps breaking every one to two months tops and has to be replaced. Screen stops working, buttons stop working etc

reviews.title: A brand new junk
reviews.review_text: The brand new phone won't charge and turns on. While charging, the phone shakes with the white words "Enabled by Naikos" on the black screen. Why Walmart sells a junk like this. It costs more than $40 to get this phone and more than $30" to get it activated. It looks like neither can be refunded.

reviews.title: My review

reviews.title: Waste of Time and Money
reviews.review_text: Terrible purchase. Could not activate the phone at AT%26T because it was not scanned properly at the warehouse. Store says it's impossible but here I am.
IF YOU ARE PLANNING ON TRANSFERRING A SIM CARD WITH THIS PHONE, FORGET IT. IMPOSSIBLE TO GET PRE INSTALLED SIM OUT. I BROKE 2 NAILS AND CUT MY THUMB OPEN. PHONE DOESNT WORK NOW. THANKS A LOT ATT.

reviews.title: IT SUCKS!
reviews.review_text: do not buy these phones from wlmart, or anyone. I wasted hours and it was the most unpleasant experience. ATT refuses to sell these products themselves, and that really should tellu something.

reviews.title: Not prepaid
reviews.review_text: I bought this phone because it said “prepaid” on the package. When I went to set it up, it wanted me to choose a plan that I would have to pay monthly. I don't understand why I need a plan if it is a prepaid phone.

reviews.title: browser not reàdable.
reviews.review_text: the biggest issué is its locked tó google browser and the browser does not fit the screen. when you type passwórds you cannt see what yoú're typing. ór if its enough.
Good phone for my father; however when I received the phone I could not call my dad. I need to take the phone to a Walmart store to have it rescanned. That is my only issue.

reviews.title: cell phone
reviews.review_text: im not able to activate due to the fact , it still belongs to walmart and iv went back to the store to get it fixed so i could get it working and they could not fix it

reviews.title: Prepaid phone a no-go
reviews.review_text: Not at all happy with this product. Poor quality and much too difficult to set up. I managed to get it turned on, but chose not to activate the card. Also bought a $40 prepaid card at associate's suggestion, though I could have selected a plan and paid on line without a orepaid card. Looked at plans on line and too expensive in my opinion. Very disappointed with the return policies as well. I wasted money on this

reviews.title: Not as advertised; specs are wrong!
reviews.review_text: 1. The phone comes with 2GB, not 4GB. 2. The rear camera is only 2MP, there is no 32MP rear camera, there is no LED flash, and there is no front-facing camera. 3. It runs KaiOS 3.1, not Android 13. 4. It does not have a fingerprint reader. 5. The battery is only 1450mAh, not 4000mAh. It's still a decent phone for the price and it has nice big buttons and a bright screen. It also has a mobile Wi-Fi hotspot feature (you need to have the service enabled on your plan). I wish it took as good of pictures as the original Cingular Flex which has an LED flash. I'm not going to return it but i wish they would fix the listing because this is technically false advertising.

reviews.title: Defective phone
reviews.review_text: Charged. Phone. Phone heated up, almost too hot to touch. Phone shut off and will not work
